objective: Explore sandbox.appsteer.io's core product features, user experience, and platform capabilities. Focus on understanding the main functionality, navigation structure, key features, and business model. Prioritize product-focused content over user-generated content. Request login credentials when you encounter login forms or restricted areas that would provide valuable insights into the platform's core functionality.
